summary: An Ordinance granting permission to F. A. Goodner to improve Densmore Avenue from the south margin of Ewing Street to the Northern Pacific Railroad right-of-way, and North Thirtieth Street from the east margin of Densmore Avenue to the west margin of Wallingford Avenue, by grading and curbing the same and by the construction of concrete walks, at his own cost and expense, under certain terms and conditions.
